posts.post_title: New Additions!  FS: T206 HOFers, SLers, Variations
posts.post_content:
Posted By: Adam
I have the following graded cards available.  Please email me at aamoniz@yahoo.com if you would like any!  Shipping included in prices.  Payment by Paypal (with no additional surcharge) or money order fine.  

Regards,
Adam

T206 Addie Joss, portrait, Sweet Caporal back, PSA 2 - **SOLD, thanks Alan**
T206 Carl Lungren, Chicago variation, Piedmont back, PSA 1 - **SOLD, thanks Steve**
T206 Rube Marquard, follow through, TOLSTOI back, PSA 1 - $60.00
T206 Sam Crawford, throwing, Sweet Caporal back, PSA 1 - **SOLD, thanks Art**
T206 Ed Greminger (Southern League), Piedmont back, PSA 1 - **SOLD, thanks Danny**
T206 Joe Kelley, Piedmont back, PSA 1 - $50.00

New additions:

T206 Perdue (Southern League), Piedmont back, PSA 1 - **SOLD, thanks Danny**
T206 Cranston (Southern League), Old Mill back, PSA 1 - **SOLD, thanks Danny**
T206 Addie Joss, pitching, Sovereign back, PSA 2 - $120.00
T206 Frank Chance, batting, Old Mill back, PSA 1 - $80.00
T206 Jack Bastian (Southern League), Old Mill back, SGC 84 (highest SGC graded) - $845.00
